name: Sargon Chess
overview: Sargon Chess is a chess engine inspired by the Mesopotamian king Sargon that allows you to play a game of chess. The game features 16 different difficulty levels. A special Novice level gives you starter tips and allows you to take back moves and changes sides. It is also possible to construct Chess challenges and let "Sargon" solve them. The game can be played with 3 distinct chess sets which are displayed in a quasi-3D perspective.
